m_szDocTitle: Johnson Controls and Tyco announce future executive leadership team upon close of planned merger
m_szDocSumamry: textArticle -------------------- Johnson Controls and Tyco announce future executive leadership team upon close of planned merger May 27, 2016, 08:00 ET      from Johnson Controls MILWAUKEE and CORK, Ireland, May 27, 2016 /PRNewswire/ -- Johnson Controls (NYSE: JCI ) and Tyco International (NYSE: TYC ) today announced the senior executive team that will lead the combined company following the close of their planned merger, which is expected on or around Oct. 1, 2016.  As previously announced, at the effective time of the merger, Johnson Controls chairman and chief executive officer Alex Molina
